summary: A stingy man who saves all his money finds out he has daughter, which turns out to be a very expensive discovery.
cast: Dany Boon|Laurence Arné|Noémie Schmidt|Patrick Ridremont|Christophe Canard|Christophe Favre|Karina Marimon|Stéphan Wojtowicz|Anne-Sophie Girard|Nicolas Lumbreras|Monique Mauclair|Victor Ghesquière|Laurent Saint-Gérard|Audrey Rhodes-Greig|Noël Lafon|Jacques Marchand|Laurent Fernandez|Benoît Tachoires|Pierre Diot|Pierre Benoist|Charline Paul|Jérémy Lopez|Emmanuelle Rivière|Lisa Spurio|Amaury Breton|Matthieu Kassimo|Gavril Dartevelle|Claire Beaugé|Christine Bonnard|Julie Cochennec|Catherine Giron|Sacha Petronijevic|Jean-Luc Porraz|Laure Sirieix|Jean-Marc Lebars|Rémy Chrétien|Laurent Petitgirard|Sébastien Chabal|Véronique Berthoud|Marc de Panda|Isabelle Ziental
title: Manual de un tacaño
